page.title: 01SUMMERPIT BOTTOM
page.content: Most of this block is owned by the Elveden Estate and the remainder by the Forestry Commission. The F.C. part is a continuation of 0580 0273 and the general information applies. The only roads are 1 mile of the A11 and 2 miles of the B1106. Even if public transport uses these roads there are no stops- see also 0580 0273 and 0576 0282. The Icknield Way traverses it in a N.W. direction, access for walkers being allowed by the Elveden Estate. In a triangular clearing where the Icknield Way meets the B1106 there is a small monument commemorating the planting of the Kings Forest in 1935.
